TEXT.S: = Palinkaan = Gaga mniq Hwareyseyn Sincungsyang ka alang Palinkaan. 543 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 1,537 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 31% niqan 480 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 69% niqan 1,057 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Amis 17%, Truku 8%, Bunun 2%, Paiwan 1%, Tayal 1%, Sakizaya 1%, ni rahuq na o 1%.
